# Verify TNF (Two-Node Fencing) configuration with valid fencing credentials

exec openshift-install agent create image --dir $WORK

stderr 'The rendezvous host IP \(node0 IP\) is 192.168.111.20'

exists $WORK/agent.x86_64.iso
exists $WORK/auth/kubeconfig
exists $WORK/auth/kubeadmin-password

# Verify the fencing credentials file is generated in the manifests path
isoIgnitionContains agent.x86_64.iso /etc/assisted/manifests/fencing-credentials.yaml
isocmp agent.x86_64.iso /etc/assisted/manifests/fencing-credentials.yaml expected/fencing-credentials.yaml

-- install-config.yaml --

    - hostName: master-1
      address: redfish+https://192.168.111.2:8000/redfish/v1/Systems/def456
      username: admin
      password: password456
      certificateVerification: Enabled
